channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- W4 Post List
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- W4 Post List

item.title: CVE-2023-0374|2024-08-02T05:10:55.568Z -- unknown -- w4%20post%20list
item.description: The W4 Post List WordPress plugin before 2.4.6 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-1373|2024-08-02T05:49:10.337Z -- unknown -- w4%20post%20list
item.description: The W4 Post List WordPress plugin before 2.4.6 does not escape some URLs before outputting them in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

item.title: CVE-2023-1371|2024-08-02T05:49:10.193Z -- unknown -- w4%20post%20list
item.description: The W4 Post List WordPress plugin before 2.4.6 does not ensure that password protected posts can be accessed before displaying their content, which could allow any authenticated users to access them
